description.raw:
Needs:

* ~~#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/pull-requests/123/~~ released
* ~~#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/226/~~ releases

Until now, Fuel URLs could be used only within `<include>` tags. This PR enables their use within any tag that supports URIs, such as `<uri>` and `<filename>`.

The main things needed for this to happen are:

* `common::MeshManager` needs to call a Fuel callback to fetch meshes. The `ign-common` PR allows that.
* `fuel_tools::fetchResource` needs to support mesh files. The `ign-fuel-tools` PR adds that.

This was motivated by the need to more easily embed actors within a world. Without this PR, it's quite inconvenient to need to hardcode the actor's trajectory within the actor's SDF file.

title: Support <uri>s from Fuel
